biography: Ho-Chih Huang is a Masters Candidate at Carnegie Mellon University, Information System Management Program. He worked at ACT Genomics as a Bioinformatics Engineer for three years. His focus is to improve the system for managing cancer information to offer accurate treatment suggestions to physicians. He also aims to increase system efficiency in hope to lower service cost so more patients can benefit from Precision Medicine. As a blockchain enthusiast, he hopes to contribute to a blockchain-based healthcare system that will help both patients and researchers.

projects.description: An Android messaging app that doesn't require the internet
projects.detail: The Android application is made from hotspot controlling API

projects.name: Simple Blockchain
projects.description: A simple blockchain that provides Proof-of-work
projects.detail: The blockchain is able to store simple data and validate itself
